reuters.title: FORD CANADA <FC> FEBRUARY CAR SALES OFF SIX PCT
reuters.body: Ford Motor Co of Canada, 90 pct-owned by Ford Motor Co <F>, said February car sales fell six pct to 13,734 units from year-earlier 14,589 units. Year-to-date car sales fell one pct to 25,534 units from 25,851 units the previous year, it said. Reuter 
